Posts.Content: Thanks. I know the list of side effects is tremendous. I am not a pill taker, but I trust my doctor. I have a follow up in October. If I'm not tolerating it by then, she said she would change to something else. Hope you find something. Take care
Posts.Title: Arimidex - should I take it?

Posts.Content: I just started it last Friday. My Dr. said the results far outweigh the side effects. I've been so tired. Can't stay awake. Only side effect so far.
Posts.Title: Arimidex - should I take it?
